ProductStore.title: Store Title
ProductStore.subtitle: Store Sub Title
ProductStore.authDeclinedMessage: There has been a problem with your method of payment. Please try a different method or call customer service.
ProductStore.authFraudMessage: Your order has been rejected and your account has been disabled due to fraud.

Out of Stock Content. Specific Page Content that may be included informing the customer that the Product is not available for purchase.

Email Head Tag Include
Common Email Styles
Content that is included in the beginning of all BigFish generated emails. Use this to define standard heading information such as your logo and company information.
Content that is included at the end of all BigFish generated emails. Use this to define standard closing information such as Yours-Sincerely and your company contact information.
The actual email content that will be included in the New-Customer email (when the customer completes the registration form).
The actual email content that will be included in the Change-Customer email (when the customer updates their profile).
The actual email content that will be included in the Forgot-Password email.
The actual email content that will be included in the Abandoned Cart email. Other PARAMETERS control the timing of this email.

The actual email content that will be included in the Contact-Us email. This email is sent to both the customer and the client. Len: not sure how this works since we probably grab content from the form.

The actual email content that will be included in the Request-Catalog email. This email is sent to both the customer and the client. Len: not sure how this works since we probably grab content from the form.
The actual email content that will be included in the Request-Catalog email. This email is sent to both the customer and the client.
The actual email content that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).
The actual email content that will be included in the Order-Change email (when the Status on the Order gets modified from one state to another).
The actual email content that will be included in the Ship Review email. Other PARAMETERS control the timing of this email.
Content 'order detail' that will be included in the Order-Confirm email (when the customer places an Order).
The actual email content that will be included in the Mailing-List email. This email sent to both the customer and the client.
The actual email content that will be included in the Scheduled Job email. This email sent to both the customer and the client.
The actual email content that will be included in the Email A Friend Notification.
